title: JavaScript for Beginners
concept: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, including syntax, variables, and functions.
description: This course covers the basics of JavaScript, perfect for those who are new to programming.
subject: Programming

title: Advanced Python
concept: Dive deep into Python's advanced concepts, including OOP, decorators, and multiprocessing.
description: A course for experienced developers looking to master Python's powerful features.
subject: Programming

title: Web Development with React
concept: Learn how to build dynamic web applications using React and modern JavaScript.
description: This course teaches React fundamentals, hooks, and state management.
subject: Web Development

title: Rust Programming
concept: Master Rust programming language, focusing on memory safety and performance.
description: A complete guide to Rust's ownership system, lifetimes, and concurrency features.
subject: Programming

title: Ruby on Rails Mastery
concept: Learn to build full-stack web applications using Ruby on Rails.
description: This course covers MVC architecture, database migrations, and API development in Rails.
subject: Web Development

title: Go Language Essentials
concept: Learn the fundamentals of Go (Golang) and build high-performance applications.
description: This course introduces Go syntax, concurrency, and practical applications.
subject: Programming
